options.color: Color to change your accent color to. Use one of the suggestions or a HEX color.

errors.profileSync: You do not have a Discord profile color to sync from! To set one, edit your Discord User Profile and change your Profile Color.

strings.successDescription: This color will be used across most of CRBT's replies to you, as well as on your profile and info cards, when someone else visits them.
strings.successProfileSync: Your Discord profile color will be synced to your CRBT accent color. This color will be used across most of CRBT's replies to you, as well as on your profile and info cards, when someone else visits them
